actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to clarify that utility line technicians qualify as emergency response providers.

summary.text: This bill specifies that utility line technicians responding to a major disaster or emergency qualify as emergency response providers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to clarify that utility line technicians qualify as emergency response providers.
A bill to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to clarify that utility line technicians qualify as emergency response providers.
